comments.body: Should this class be private to mllib.tree? If yes, do we need bean properties? I am assuming the `@BeanProperty` is being used for java interoperability. But we might not need to expose this class directly to the users.

comments.body: I agree that users should not really need to use DTParams, so I will make it private[mllib].  But BeanProperty is nice since it generates getters/setters for the subclasses DTClassifierParams and DTRegressorParams as well (for Java, as you figured).
